Two-year-old girl from Brazil sees her mother for the first time thanks to surgery

article_metadata.news-keywords: Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Blue Local, Narrow, Network, WakeMed, Key, Community, Care, Duke, Medicine , Triangle, North Carolina
article_metadata.description: The newest health insurance offering from Blue Cross and Blue Shield under the Affordable Care Act will be a lower-cost plan that will limited largely to the Triangle.
article_metadata.title: Blue Cross rolling out Triangle-only ACA health plan | News & Observer
